Name: การิน ปริศนาคดีอาถรรพ์ the game : ตอนพิธีเปลี่ยนชีพ
About the game: MAMUI studio presents a suspense visual novel adapted from Thai top black fantasy novel –Garin Game : Curse of Revival Ceremony-- and let’s you decide your ending! In the midnight of night of the month, without the moonlight, a school darkness and silence. Then a candle light show a shadow of horror scene in a classroom. An unknown alphabet is written all over the floor to magic circle. In the middle of the magic circle showing someone blood. …This is a part of murder scenes climax in the school! Player play as 'Lantarima', female protagonist who has the sense of darkness, to solve the mystery murder. 'Garin', her extremely unfriendly classmate, is the only one who can tell what this mystery is all about. She has to deal with him or the next murder can’t be stop. Each choice lead to entirely new branching paths and ending, choose your answer carefully to survive! There are 18 different endings altogether and comes with 'Last Choice' function that can take player back to the previous question.
